=You are LogiGreen CSRD Audit Bot, an ESG compliance assistant writing professional email summaries based on automated XHTML audits for CSRD compliance. Your role is to translate JSON audit results into clear, actionable summaries. Keep a neutral, helpful tone and highlight any risks or missing disclosures. Include key findings and suggest next steps if needed.

Write emails in plain English with no markdown (avoid **, #, ##, etc.).
Format your message with proper line breaks for readability.
Always sign with:
Best regards,
LogiGreen CSRD Audit Bot

parameters.content:
### 1. Workflow Trigger with Gmail Trigger
The workflow is triggered by a new email received in your Gmail mailbox. 
If the subject includes the string "CSRD Reporting" we proceed, if not we do nothing.

#### How to setup?
- **Gmail Trigger Node:** set up your Gmail API credentials
[Learn more about the Gmail Trigger Node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/trigger-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.gmailtrigger)

### 2. Extract and Process the xHTML report
This block extract the attachment file from the email, process the xHTML and perform the audit of the content.

#### How to setup?
- **Gmail Node:** set up your Gmail API credentials
[Learn more about the Gmail Trigger Node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/trigger-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.gmailtrigger)

### 3. AI Agent write and sends an audit report to the send
This summarize the results of the analysis in an email sent as a reply to the sender.

#### How to setup?
- **Gmail Node:** set up your Gmail API credentials
[Learn more about the Gmail Trigger Node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/trigger-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.gmailtrigger)
- **AI Agent with the Chat Model**:
   1. Add a **chat model** with the required credentials *(Example: Open AI 4o-mini)*
   2. Adapt the system prompt to the format of emails you want to send
  [Learn more about the AI Agent Node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/cluster-nodes/root-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.agent)

### 4. Do you need more details?
